translated: Various birds that live on the ground sing sweetly, with pleasant voices, melodious voices, and voices that can transform at will.

original: lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rim gyis kun nas bskor te /
analyzed: lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rim gyis kun nas bskor te /
translated: The city of the gods is surrounded by seven concentric moats.

original: 'obs da dag kyang zabs dang / rgyar dpag tshad gcig tsam yod de /
analyzed: 'obs da dag kyang zabs dang / rgyar dpag tshad gcig tsam yod de /
translated: The moats are one league deep and wide.

original: pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs pa na /
analyzed: pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs pa na /
translated: The railings are made of four types of materials: gold, silver, beryl, and crystal.

original: chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste /
analyzed: chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste /
translated: The water is cool and filled with honey-like nectar.

original: me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar pos yongs su khebs la /
analyzed: me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar pos yongs su khebs la /
translated: It is covered with utpala, padma, kumuda, and puṇḍarīka flowers.

original: chu las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
analyzed: chu las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
translated: Various water birds sing in sweet, pleasant, and melodious voices, and they have the ability to transform their appearance at will.

original: 'obs de dag na chu ka dang / rgyu mo gung dang / 'bru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de /
analyzed: 'obs de dag na chu ka dang / rgyu mo gung dang / 'bru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de /
translated: In the moats, there are various kinds of rice and grain that grow without cultivation.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three play and enjoy themselves on the water’s edge.

original: 'obs de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par yongs su grub pa ste /🔽me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam /
analyzed: 'obs de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par yongs su grub pa ste / me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam /
translated: Around those moats are various trees of flowers and trees of fruits that are well-formed.🔽They are like a garland of flowers.

original: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
analyzed: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, it is like a garland of flowers strung on a thread or a skilled garland maker who has well-made a flower earring.

original: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
analyzed: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
translated: Various birds that are born from the ground have pleasant, melodious voices, pleasant sounds, soft voices, and forms that can change at will. They sing in pleasant voices.

original: de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
analyzed: de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
translated: There the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, together with their retinues, play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in pleasures.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
translated: They experience the results of their own actions.

original: lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /🔽chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de / chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: Twenty yojanas to the east of the divine city is the pleasure grove of the Thirty-three gods called Vṛkṣaḥ, the Grove of Various Chariots.🔽It is two hundred and fifty yojanas in height

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: and two hundred and fifty yojanas in width.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa /
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference.

original: dbyibs legs @32a * //
analyzed: dbyibs legs @32a * //
translated: It is well shaped,

original: shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
analyzed: shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
translated: beautiful and pleasant to behold.

original: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te /
analyzed: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te /
translated: It is completely surrounded by a golden fence.

original: ra ba de'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la /🔽ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: ra ba de'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la / ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: That fence is one yojana in height.🔽That fence has four types of parapets made of gold, silver, vaiḍūrya and crystal.

original: gyen du 'phang ba dang / mthur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa rgyu ba rnam pa bzhi yod de /
analyzed: gyen du 'phang ba dang / mthur du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa rgyu ba rnam pa bzhi yod de /
translated: There are four types of crossbeams, those that extend upward, those that extend downward, those that extend as a canopy and those that extend as a bridge.

original: gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so //
analyzed: gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so //
translated: made of gold, silver, beryl, and crystal.

original: de'i nang gi sa gzhi ni dbyi bas legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris shing legs par bris pa /
analyzed: de'i nang gi sa gzhi ni dbyi bas legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris shing legs par bris pa /
translated: The ground within is well swept, beautiful, and lovely to behold.

original: tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste /🔽'jam shing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' pa 'am /
analyzed: tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste / 'jam shing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' pa 'am /
translated: It is painted with a hundred and one colors.🔽It is smooth and very soft, like kiṃśuka silk

original: ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du /
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du /
translated: or cotton wool.

original: rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed rkang pa bteg na par zhes byed la /
analyzed: rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed rkang pa bteg na par zhes byed la /
translated: When the foot is placed on it, it sinks down and when the foot is lifted, it bounces back.

original: me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te /
analyzed: me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te /
translated: It is completely covered with many mandārava flowers up to the knees.

original: rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor /
analyzed: rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor /
translated: By the power of the wind, old flowers fall off

original: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te /
analyzed: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te /
translated: and new flowers spread out.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis na //
analyzed: lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis na //
translated: By the power of the gods’ merit,

original: shing rta sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang// me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed //
analyzed: shing rta sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang// me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed //
translated: that scattered the old flowers

original: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems //🔽zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems // zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: and spread out the new ones.

original: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na rdzing bu zhig yod de /🔽chur dpag tshad lnga bcu /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na rdzing bu zhig yod de / chur dpag tshad lnga bcu /
translated: In the park called Various Chariots, there was a pond🔽fifty yojanas long,

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu /
translated: fifty yojanas wide,

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de /
translated: and two hundred yojanas in circumference.

original: rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so //
analyzed: rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so //
translated: That pond was surrounded by railings made of four types of materials: gold, silver, beryl, and crystal.

original: rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa yod de /
analyzed: rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa yod de /
translated: On the four sides of that pond, there were staircases

original: them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so //
analyzed: them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so //
translated: also made of four types of materials: gold, silver, beryl, and crystal.

original: rdzing bu de'i lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te /
analyzed: rdzing bu de'i lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te /
translated: The pond is surrounded by four kinds of railings made of gold, silver, beryl, and crystal.

original: chu bsil ba dang / chu @32b sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing /
analyzed: chu bsil ba dang / chu @32b sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing /
translated: It is filled with cool water and water that tastes like honey.

original: me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar pos yongs su khebs la /
analyzed: me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar pos yongs su khebs la /
translated: It is covered with utpala, padma, kumuda, and puṇḍarīka flowers.

original: chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
analyzed: chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
translated: Various water birds sing sweetly, with pleasant, melodious voices, and with forms that can change at will.

original: rdzing bu de'i nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /
analyzed: rdzing bu de'i nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /
translated: Around the pond are flower trees and fruit trees that grow well, with good shapes and good forms.

original: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam /
analyzed: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam /
translated: They are like garlands of flowers, like a garland maker’s display of garlands.

original: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
analyzed: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
translated: The skilled garland-makers make garlands of flowers strung on thread and flower earrings.

original: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
analyzed: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
translated: The various birds born in the fields sing sweetly, with pleasant voices, melodious voices, and voices that can transform into any sound.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments that come from wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: There are trees that produce various ornaments, such as armlets, anklets, and visible and invisible ornaments.

original: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
translated: There are trees that produce various musical instruments, such as

original: pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: flutes, lutes, three-stringed lutes, clay drums, and tabors.

original: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As soon as the gods or goddesses think of something, it appears in their hands.

original: bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: There are also four kinds of nectar, honey, and alcoholic drinks.

original: yang thog rnams dang khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing /🔽lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par @33a * //
analyzed: yang thog rnams dang khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par @33a * //
translated: The tops of the houses, the multi-storied buildings, the houses, the mansions, the pavilions, the places for watching performances, and the bridges are beautified by crowds of women.

original: bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de /
analyzed: bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de /
translated: Many celestial maidens attend to them, and the pleasant sounds of cymbals and drums resound. They are well-perfumed with various fragrances, and they are endowed with food and drink.

original: de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
analyzed: de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
translated: There the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, together with their retinues, play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in pleasures.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
translated: They experience the results of their own actions.

original: de'i lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu /
analyzed: de'i lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu /
translated: The road there is twenty leagues long.

original: zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de /
analyzed: zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de /
translated: It is two and a half yojanas wide, well shaped, beautiful to behold, covered with gold dust and sprinkled with sandalwood water.

original: de'i glo g-yas g-yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /
analyzed: de'i glo g-yas g-yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /
translated: On its right and left sides are various flowering trees and fruit trees that are well grown, well shaped and well formed.

original: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na /🔽me tog phreng rgyud dam /
analyzed: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na / me tog phreng rgyud dam /
translated: They are like a garland of flowers,🔽like a garland of flowers

original: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
analyzed: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
translated: or like a garland of flowers well made by a skilled garland maker.

original: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
analyzed: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
translated: Various birds born from eggs sing sweetly, with pleasant voices, melodious voices and voices that can change at will.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments made from the wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do//
analyzed: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do//
translated: There are trees that produce various musical instruments: the vīṇā, flute, three-stringed lute, kettledrum, and horn.

original: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: There are trees that produce various ornaments: armlets, anklets, and visible and invisible ornaments.

original: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As soon as the gods or the daughters of the gods think of something, it appears in their hands.

original: lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste /
translated: On that road there are various kinds of vehicles, such as

original: glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de /
analyzed: glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de /
translated: elephant vehicles, horse vehicles, chariot vehicles, and palanquin vehicles.

original: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par gyur te /
analyzed: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par gyur te /
translated: As soon as the gods or goddesses wish for a vehicle, they mount such a vehicle.

original: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing @33b dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
analyzed: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing @33b dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
translated: They go to the park called Various Chariots and play, enjoy themselves, and amuse themselves.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
translated: They experience the results of their own actions.

original: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the park called Various Chariots?

original: smras pa / skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na rdzing bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang / shing sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gos dang rgyan sna tshogs dang /
analyzed: smras pa / skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na rdzing bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang / shing sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gos dang rgyan sna tshogs dang /
translated: He replied, “In the Nandana forest, there is a pond called Citra, and there are various trees, leaves, flowers, fruits, clothes, and ornaments.

original: lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la /
analyzed: lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la /
translated: There are various celestial maidens.

original: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
translated: When the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in sensual pleasures in the Nandana forest,

original: de'i tshe yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do //
translated: at that time they play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in sensual pleasures in various ways.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na de'i skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na de'i skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o //
translated: Since they experience the results of their own actions, the name of that forest is Nandana, which means ‘various chariots.’

original: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
translated: To the east of the park Various Chariots, at a distance of twenty yojanas, is a place called Various Good Ground.

original: chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: It is two hundred and fifty yojanas wide.

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: It is two hundred and fifty yojanas wide.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /🔽lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te /🔽gser gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so //
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa / lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te / gser gyi lan kan gyi gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so //
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference, has an excellent shape, and is beautiful to behold.🔽It is surrounded by four types of fences made of gold, silver, beryl, and crystal.🔽The posts, railings, and crossbeams of the golden fence are made of silver.

original: dngul gyi ni gser las byas so //🔽bee d'urya'i ni shel las byas so //
analyzed: dngul gyi ni gser las byas so // bee d'urya'i ni shel las byas so //
translated: The posts, railings, and crossbeams of the silver fence are made of gold.🔽The posts, railings, and crossbeams of the beryl fence are made of crystal.

original: shel gyi ni gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bee d'urya las byas so //
analyzed: shel gyi ni gtan ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bee d'urya las byas so //
translated: The posts, railings, and crossbeams of the crystal fence are made of beryl.

original: de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste /🔽'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am /
analyzed: de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste / 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am /
translated: The ground there is well-shaped, beautiful and attractive, drawn with one hundred and one colors.🔽It is smooth and very soft, like a ball of cotton

original: ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te /🔽rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed /
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te / rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed /
translated: or a ball of wool.

original: rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la /
analyzed: rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la /
translated: When you put your foot down, it sinks in and when you lift it up, it springs back.

original: me tog man nga ra ba mang pos pus mo nub btsam du yongs su khebs te /
analyzed: me tog man nga ra ba mang pos pus mo nub btsam du yongs su khebs te /
translated: It is completely covered with many māndārava flowers that reach up to the knees.

original: de na mi ma yin pa rnams rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor /
analyzed: de na mi ma yin pa rnams rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor /
translated: There, non-humans, by the power of the wind, cast off the old flowers

original: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te /
analyzed: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te /
translated: and arrange the new ones well.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: They also say:

original: lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na //
analyzed: lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na //
translated: By the power of the gods' karma,

original: sa gzhi sna tshogs can na @34a * //
analyzed: sa gzhi sna tshogs can na @34a * //
translated: on the ground with various features,🔽a great wind arises

original: rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed //
analyzed: rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor bar byed //
translated: that scatters the old flowers

original: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems //🔽zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems //🔽zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: and arranges the new ones well.

original: de'i lam srang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de /
analyzed: de'i lam srang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de /
translated: Its road is one and a half yojanas wide.

original: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
analyzed: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
translated: It is well shaped, beautiful and attractive.

original: gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de /
analyzed: gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de /
translated: It is covered with golden sand and sprinkled with sandalwood water.

original: de'i glo g-yas na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /
analyzed: de'i glo g-yas na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /
translated: To its right are various flower trees and fruit trees that are well grown, well shaped and well formed.🔽They are like a garland of flowers.

original: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na /🔽me tog phreng rgyud dam /
analyzed: me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na / me tog phreng rgyud dam /
translated: For example,

original: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
analyzed: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
translated: it is like a skilled garland maker or garland maker's apprentice who has strung a garland of flowers or made a flower earring well.

original: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par 'byin to //
analyzed: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par 'byin to //
translated: Various birds born from the earth sing melodious songs, with pleasant voices, soft voices, and forms that can change at will.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments that come from wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: There are trees that produce various musical instruments such as flutes, reed pipes, three-stringed lutes, kettledrums, and clay drums.

original: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: There are trees that produce various ornaments, such as armlets, anklets, and other ornaments, both visible and invisible.

original: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As soon as the gods or goddesses think of them, they appear in their hands.

original: lam de ni bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: lam de ni bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste /
translated: This road is also adorned with various vehicles, such as

original: glang po'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod do //
analyzed: glang po'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod do //
translated: elephant vehicles, horse vehicles, chariot vehicles, and palanquin vehicles.

original: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon ba 'ong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon ba 'ong bar 'gyur te /
translated: As soon as the gods or goddesses think of them, the vehicles appear,

original: de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du dong zhing ci bder gnas par mngon par dga' bar byed do //
analyzed: de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du dong zhing ci bder gnas par mngon par dga' bar byed do //
translated: and they enjoy riding on them to the various regions of the ground.

original: de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang @34b dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do //
analyzed: de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang @34b dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do //
translated: The divine sages live there and practice celibacy.

original: de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na /
analyzed: de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na /
translated: Similarly, twenty yojanas to the south of the city of the gods

original: skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod do //🔽chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod do // chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: is a pleasure grove called Nandana.

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: It is two hundred and fifty yojanas in length and width,🔽and one thousand yojanas in circumference.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
translated: It is well-shaped, beautiful, and pleasant to behold.

original: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te /
analyzed: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te /
translated: It is surrounded by a golden fence.

original: ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de /
analyzed: ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de /
translated: The fence is one yojana high.

original: shing rta sna tshogs can ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: shing rta sna tshogs can ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be described in detail like the Citra-ratha Grove.

original: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
translated: There is this difference:

original: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the pleasure grove called Nandana?

original: smras pa / skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal na rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la /
analyzed: smras pa / skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal na rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la /
translated: In the Nandana garden there is a pond called Nandana, and there are trees, leaves, flowers, fruits, and ornaments that become rough, and there are rough divine maidens.

original: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing /
translated: When the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in fun in the Nandana garden, at that time their bodies also become rough.

original: sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te /
translated: And their minds also become rough.

original: g-yul la mos par 'gyur bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: g-yul la mos par 'gyur bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o //
translated: Since they become intent on battle, that is why the name of the garden is called Nandana.

original: skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na /
translated: Twenty yojanas to the south of the Nandana garden,

original: sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur tshal bya ba yod de /
analyzed: sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur tshal bya ba yod de /
translated: there is a place called Bhūmija Nandana.

original: chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: It is two hundred and fifty yojanas in height

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: and two hundred and fifty yojanas in width.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de /
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference.

original: sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be described in detail as in the case of the excellent ground of various things.

original: lha'i grong khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de /🔽chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: lha'i grong khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de / chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: Twenty yojanas to the west of the divine city is a pleasure grove called Mixed Grove.🔽It is two hundred and fifty yojanas in height

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: and two hundred and fifty yojanas in width.

original: mtha' skor dpag tshad stong yod la /
analyzed: mtha' skor dpag tshad stong yod la /
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference.

original: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba /
analyzed: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba /
translated: It is completely surrounded by a golden fence.

original: ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de /
analyzed: ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de /
translated: The fence is one yojana in height.

original: snga ma rnams na ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma rnams na ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be described in detail as in the case of the previous ones.

original: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
translated: This is the difference.

original: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the pleasure grove called Mixed Grove?

original: smras pa / skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal ni rdzing bu @35a * //
analyzed: smras pa / skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal ni rdzing bu @35a * //
translated: The Nandana forest is a pleasure grove of the gods of the Thirty-three.

original: 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams 'dres pa yod la /
analyzed: 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams 'dres pa yod la /
translated: It is called Nandana because it is a place where the gods enjoy themselves.

original: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang 'chol par 'dres te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang 'chol par 'dres te /
translated: When the gods of the Thirty-three play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in the pleasures of the five senses in the Nandana forest, they do so in a disorderly manner.

original: shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
analyzed: shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
translated: They play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in the pleasures of the five senses in a disorderly manner.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres ba'i tshal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres ba'i tshal zhes bya'o //
translated: Because they experience the results of their own actions, the pleasure grove is called Nandana.

original: skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Twenty leagues west of the Nandana forest is a place called the Mixed Ground.

original: chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: It is two hundred and fifty yojanas in height

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: and two hundred and fifty yojanas in width.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de /
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference.

original: sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be described in detail as the excellent ground of the past.

original: lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na /
analyzed: lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na /
translated: Twenty yojanas north of the city of the gods

original: skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de /🔽chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de / chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: is a pleasure grove called Nandana.🔽It is two hundred and fifty yojanas in height

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: and two hundred and fifty yojanas in width.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la /
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference.

original: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te /
analyzed: gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te /
translated: It is completely surrounded by a golden fence.

original: ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de /
analyzed: ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de /
translated: The fence is one yojana in height.

original: snga ma rnams na ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma rnams na ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be described in detail as explained in the past.

original: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
translated: This is the difference.

original: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the pleasure grove called Nandana?

original: smras pa / skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la /
analyzed: smras pa / skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la /
translated: He replied: “In the Nandana garden there is a pond called Nandana, and there are trees, leaves, flowers, fruits, clothes, ornaments, and divine maidens called Nandana.

original: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' la /
translated: When the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three play, enjoy themselves, and amuse themselves in the Nandana garden, they are also completely happy and extremely joyful.

original: dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
analyzed: dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
translated: They are happy and delighted, and they play, enjoy themselves, and amuse themselves.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o //
translated: Because they experience the results of their own actions, the name of that garden is Nandana.”

original: skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig @35b yod do //🔽chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig @35b yod do // chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: Twenty yojanas north of Nandana, the pleasure grove of the Thirty-three gods, there is a place called Sudharmā, the good place.

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
translated: It is two hundred and fifty yojanas wide and two hundred and fifty yojanas long.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste /
translated: It is one thousand yojanas in circumference and is beautiful, delightful and attractive.

original: sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be described in detail as in the case of the previous good places.

original: lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su 'du sa brtol zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su 'du sa brtol zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: In the northeast corner of the city of the Thirty-three gods, there is a tree of the Thirty-three gods called Pārijāta, the excellent tree.

original: yongs 'du las brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go //
analyzed: yongs 'du las brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go //
translated: The roots of the Pārijāta go down fifty yojanas.

original: 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do //
analyzed: 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do //
translated: It is one hundred yojanas high.

original: yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do //
analyzed: yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do //
translated: Its branches extend fifty yojanas.

original: yongs 'du sa brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod de /
analyzed: yongs 'du sa brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod de /
translated: The branches of the wish fulfilling tree of Indra extend in five directions.

original: yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
analyzed: yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
translated: One branch extends fifty leagues to the east.

original: yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
analyzed: yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
translated: A second extends fifty leagues to the south.

original: yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
analyzed: yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
translated: A third extends fifty leagues to the west.

original: yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
analyzed: yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do //
translated: A fourth extends fifty leagues to the north.

original: yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur steng gi nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go //🔽yongs 'du sa brtol gyi chur dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do //
analyzed: yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur steng gi nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go // yongs 'du sa brtol gyi chur dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do //
translated: The fifth branch extends fifty leagues above, filling the sky.🔽The wish fulfilling tree of Indra is one hundred and fifty leagues tall.

original: zheng du yang dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do //
analyzed: zheng du yang dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do //
translated: It is one hundred and fifty leagues wide.

original: mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do //🔽yongs 'du sa brtol gyi dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo //
analyzed: mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do // yongs 'du sa brtol gyi dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo //
translated: It is surrounded by three hundred and fifty leagues.🔽The fragrance of the wish fulfilling tree of Indra spreads fifty leagues with the wind.

original: rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo //
analyzed: rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo //
translated: It spreads twenty five leagues against the wind.

original: dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go //
translated: It shines, glows, and radiates light for eighty leagues.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma /
translated: When the leaves of the celestial tree of the Thirty-Three gods turn yellow, the Thirty-Three gods think, “Alas!

original: yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la /
analyzed: yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la /
translated: The leaves of the celestial tree have turned yellow. Before long, they will fall.” They are delighted and rejoice.

original: de'i skabs kyang yod do //
analyzed: de'i skabs kyang yod do //
translated: There is a time when this occurs and there is an occasion for this.🔽When the leaves of the celestial tree of the Thirty-Three gods fall, the Thirty-Three gods think, “Alas!

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur
translated: The leaves of the celestial tree have fallen. Before long, buds will appear.”

original: ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i @36a * //🔽dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
analyzed: ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i @36a * // dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
translated: and they live in a state of complete joy and delight.🔽There is a time for that, and there is an occasion for that.🔽

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig 'thon pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig bye bar🔽'gyur ro zhes /🔽kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig 'thon pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro zhes / kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
translated: The time and occasion also exist when the gods of the Thirty-Three rejoice and delight in the appearance of the buds on the coral tree.🔽The time and occasion also exist when the gods of the Thirty-Three rejoice and delight in the appearance of the buds on the coral tree.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus btol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus btol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar
translated: The time and occasion also exist when the gods of the Thirty-Three rejoice and delight in the opening of the buds on the coral tree.

original: 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
translated: There is a time and an occasion for the gods of the Thirty-Three to be joyful and delighted when the coral tree in the Sudharmā hall begins to bud.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog gi kha 'bus pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog🔽kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus yang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog gi kha 'bus pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus yang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
translated: When the coral tree begins to bud, the gods of the Thirty-Three say, “Oh, the coral tree is budding! It will not be long before it is in full bloom.”🔽There is a time and an occasion for the gods of the Thirty-Three to be joyful and delighted when the coral tree in the Sudharmā hall is in full bloom.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di kha 'bye ba las nad ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di kha 'bye ba las nad ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams
translated: When the coral tree is in full bloom, the gods of the Thirty-Three say, “Oh, the coral tree is in full bloom! It will not be long before the petals fall.”

original: cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
analyzed: cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do //
translated: There is a time and an occasion when they are all in full bloom, and they are delighted and rejoice.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri'i rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri'i rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo
translated: When the Pārijāta tree of the Thirty-Three Gods is in full bloom, the fragrance of its flowers spreads with the wind for a hundred leagues

original: // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo //
analyzed: // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo //
translated: and against the wind for fifty leagues.

original: dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go //
translated: For eighty leagues, its light and color shine.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du /
translated: The Blessed One has said this:

original: dge slong dag @36b sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go //
analyzed: dge slong dag @36b sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go //
translated: “Monks, the root of the Pārijāta tree of the Thirty-Three Gods goes down fifty leagues.

original: 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgyad yod do //
analyzed: 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgyad yod do //
translated: It is 8 yojanas high.

original: yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag rnams ni dpag tshad lnga bcur gyes so //
analyzed: yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag rnams ni dpag tshad lnga bcur gyes so //
translated: Its branches, leaves and twigs extend 50 yojanas.

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par
translated: Bhikṣus, when the leaves of the Pārijāta tree of the Thirty-Three gods turn yellow, at that time the Thirty-Three gods think, Alas, the leaves of this Pārijāta tree are turning yellow. Now it will not be long before

original: 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
analyzed: 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
translated: the leaves fall. They are delighted and rejoice.

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal
translated: Bhikṣus, when the leaves of the Pārijāta tree of the Thirty-Three gods fall, at that time the Thirty-Three gods think, Alas, the leaves of this Pārijāta tree have fallen. Now it will not be long before🔽the flowers appear.

original: mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pas de'i dus kyang yod do //
analyzed: mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pas de'i dus kyang yod do //
translated: The time when the gods of the Thirty-three rejoice and are delighted, thinking, “The eye of the Pāruṣaka tree has appeared,” is also a time.

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol sbal mig 'thon pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'bya bar
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol sbal mig 'thon pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'bya bar
translated: Monks, when the eye of the Pāruṣaka tree of the Thirty-three gods appears, the Thirty-three gods rejoice and are delighted, thinking, “The eye of the Pāruṣaka tree has appeared. Now it will not be long before the Pāruṣaka eye opens.”

original: 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
translated: The time when the Thirty-three gods rejoice and are delighted, thinking, “The eye of the Pāruṣaka tree has appeared,” is also a time.

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa sum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa sum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me
translated: Monks, when the Pāruṣaka eye of the Pāruṣaka tree of the Thirty-three gods opens, the Thirty-three gods rejoice and are delighted, thinking, “The Pāruṣaka eye has opened. Now it will not be long before the Pāruṣaka tree bears fruit.”

original: tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
analyzed: tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
translated: The time comes when the gods of the Thirty-Three rejoice and delight in the thought:🔽“The flowers of the Pārijāta tree are about to bloom.”

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa nas de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na da ni ring po mi
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa nas de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na da ni ring po mi
translated: The time comes when the gods of the Thirty-Three rejoice and delight in the thought:🔽“The flowers of the Pārijāta tree have bloomed.

original: thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
analyzed: thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //
translated: Now, before long, the tree will be covered with flowers.”

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi @37a * //
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi @37a * //
translated: Monks, there comes a time when the gods of the Thirty-Three rejoice and delight in the thought:🔽“The Pārijāta tree is about to bear fruit.”

original: shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha phye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas🔽par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do //🔽dge slong dag gsum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo
analyzed: shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha phye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do // dge slong dag gsum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo
translated: When the flowers of the Pārijāta tree in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three open, the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three are delighted and rejoice, thinking, “Oh, the Pārijāta tree’s flowers are opening. Before long, all its petals will fully open.”

original: // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo //
analyzed: // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo //
translated: “Monks, when all the petals of the Pārijāta tree’s flowers in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three are fully open, the fragrance of all the Pārijāta tree’s flowers spreads with the wind for a hundred leagues and against the wind for fifty leagues.

original: dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ni lhang nger 'dug go //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ni lhang nger 'dug go //
translated: It shines and glows with light and color for eighty leagues.

original: shing yongs 'du sa brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shing yongs 'du sa brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: Under the fully blossomed Pārijāta tree, the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three enjoy the five divine sense pleasures during the four months of summer.

original: rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
analyzed: rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
translated: They play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in pleasures.

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
translated: They experience the results of their own actions.

original: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungs so /
translated: Monks, the power of the Pārijāta tree of the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three is like this.”

original: // / bar gyi mdo la /
analyzed: // / bar gyi mdo la /
translated: In the Medium Length Discourses it is said:🔽First the leaves turn yellow,

original: dang por lo ma ser ba dang // de nas 'dab lhags sbal mig 'thon //🔽sbal mig bye dang me tog 'bus //
analyzed: dang por lo ma ser ba dang // de nas 'dab lhags sbal mig 'thon // sbal mig bye dang me tog 'bus //
translated: then they fall and toadstools appear.🔽The toadstools open and flowers bloom.

original: me tog kha 'bye thams cad rgyas //
analyzed: me tog kha 'bye thams cad rgyas //
translated: The flowers open and everything is in full bloom.

original: shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi aar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb yod de /🔽chur dpag tshad lnga bcu /
analyzed: shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi aar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb yod de / chur dpag tshad lnga bcu /
translated: In front of the Pārijāta tree is a slab of stone of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Gods like a flat mirror.

original: zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu /
analyzed: zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu /
translated: It is fifty leagues in width and fifty leagues in length.

original: mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya /
analyzed: mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya /
translated: It is two hundred leagues in circumference.

original: 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad bco brgyad kyi cha gcig yod de /
analyzed: 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad bco brgyad kyi cha gcig yod de /
translated: It is five and a half leagues high and one-eighteenth of a league thick.

original: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris shing legs par bris pa chon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te /🔽'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am /
analyzed: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes par bris shing legs par bris pa chon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te / 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am /
translated: It is well shaped, beautiful to behold and well drawn with one hundred and one lines.🔽It is smooth and very smooth like a petal of cotton wool

original: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te /🔽rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed /
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te / rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed /
translated: or a petal of silk cotton.

original: rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la /
analyzed: rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la /
translated: When the foot is placed down it sinks in and when the foot is lifted it springs back.

original: me tog man da rab mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te /
analyzed: me tog man da rab mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te /
translated: It is completely covered with many mandārava flowers up to the knees.

original: de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya @37b byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do //
analyzed: de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya @37b byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do //
translated: In the middle is the excellent lion throne of Śakra, lord of the gods, and the thrones of the remaining gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.

original: de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par gyur te /
analyzed: de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par gyur te /
translated: There, during the four months of summer, the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three enjoy and experience the five divine pleasures of the senses.

original: rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
analyzed: rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de /
translated: They play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in pleasures,

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
translated: experiencing the effects of their own actions.

original: aar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa dag legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste /🔽me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni /
analyzed: aar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa dag legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste / me tog phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni /
translated: Around the flat surface of the ground, which is like a polished mirror, grow various trees of flowers and fruits. They are well grown, well shaped, and well formed.🔽They are like a garland of flowers.

original: dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam ;
analyzed: dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam ;
translated: For example, it is like a garland of flowers.

original: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
analyzed: me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te /
translated: The skilled students of flower garlands make flower garlands strung on thread and flower earrings.

original: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
analyzed: thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to //
translated: The various birds born in the fields sing sweetly, with pleasant voices, soft voices, and forms that can change at will.

original: de'i nye 'khor na dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod de /
analyzed: de'i nye 'khor na dpag bsam gyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod de /
translated: In its vicinity there are four kinds of wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: gzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of garments made from the wish-fulfilling trees: blue, yellow, red, and white.

original: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
translated: There are various kinds of musical instruments:

original: pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shar rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ham shar rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: There are trees that produce the lute, the flute, the three-stringed lute, the tabor, and the horn.

original: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do //
translated: There are trees that produce various ornaments: armlets, anklets, visible and invisible ornaments.

original: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As soon as the gods or goddesses think of something, it appears in their hands.

original: bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: There are four kinds of ambrosia and drinks of honey and mead.

original: yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams dang / pra skanda na ka rnams dang / pra tsa ra ka rnams dang /
